comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.121 Safari/535.2

Steps to reproduce:

Opened dialog box (via a javascript confirm link) with certain text it in. 


Actual results:

The broswer's tab content shifts to the right, even if you hit refresh or navigate to another website.    


Expected results:

The broswer's tab content should not change.
comments.text:
Created attachment 580455
File showing the bug.  Opening dialog box A will shift the underlying content, and all future content in the tab to the right.

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.121 Safari/535.2
